name: AISACC
description:
AISACC is a first person horror stealth game about going back in time to stop yourself from creating a dangerous rouge AI. 

Controls are standard WASD with Mouse. Hold space to access the Time Dilation slider and scrub backwards through time!

Meet the team:

  • Brendan O'Hara - Project Manager
  • Michael Zahavi - 3D Modeling, Concept Art, UI
  • Charles Palermo - 3D Modeling, Concept Art, Materials
  • Kelly Wang - Character and Enemy Programming
  • Wyatt Marvil - Graphics, Music, Procedural Animations
